original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /

translated: Do not attend to eye contact.üîΩDo not attend to ear contact.üîΩDo not attend to nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la mi bgyi /

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /

translated: Do not attend to feelings that arise from the condition of eye contact.üîΩDo not attend to feelings that arise from the condition of ear contact.üîΩDo not attend to feelings that arise from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /

original: sa'i khams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: sa'i khams yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: chu'i khams yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the water element.

original: me'i @3a *// khams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: me'i @3a *// khams yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rlung gi khams yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the wind element.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams yid la mi bgyi; rnam par shes pa khams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yid la mi bgyi; rnam par shes pa khams yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: ma rig pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to ignorance.

original: 'du byed yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: 'du byed yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to name and form.

original: skye mched drug yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: skye mched drug yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the six sense sources.üîΩThey should not pay attention to contact.

original: reg pa yid la mi bgyi; tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: reg pa yid la mi bgyi; tshor ba yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to feeling.

original: sred pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: sred pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to craving.

original: len pa yid la mi bgyi /üîΩsrid pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: len pa yid la mi bgyi / srid pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to appropriation.üîΩThey should not pay attention to existence.

original: skye ba yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: skye ba yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to birth.

original: rga shi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rga shi yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the perfection of conduct.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the transcendent perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam @3b gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: bsam @3b gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi /üîΩnang stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi bgyi / nang stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the transcendent perfection of wisdom.üîΩThey should not pay attention to internal emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi / phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to external emptiness.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the emptiness of both external and internal.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the emptiness of what is endless and beginningless.

original: thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi; dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of its own mark.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi bgyi /

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /üîΩdbang po lnga yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi / dbang po lnga yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the four legs of magical power.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: stobs lnga yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi bgyi /üîΩ'phags pa'i @4a *//üîΩbden pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /üîΩbsam gtan bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi bgyi / 'phags pa'i @4a *// bden pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi / bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the noble eightfold path.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the four noble truths.üîΩThey should not pay attention to the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la mi bgyi /

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yid la mi bgyi /

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yid la mi bgyi /

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la mi bgyi /

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the four assurances.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi; byams pa chen po yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la mi bgyi; byams pa chen po yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to the four kinds of exact knowledge. They should not pay attention to great loving kindness.

original: snying rje chen po yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yid la mi bgyi /
translated: They should not pay attention to great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi bgyi / dgra bcom pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

original: rang byang chub yid la mi bgyi /
analyzed: rang byang chub yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yid la mi bgyi /

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la mi bgyi na /

analyzed: 'o na bcom ldan 'das / gzugs yid la ma @4b bgyis; tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: gzugs yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: sgra yid la ma bgyis / dri yid la ma bgyis / ro yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: reg yid la ma bgyis /
translated: they should not pay attention to tangibles,

analyzed: chos yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /

translated: Do not attend to tongue contact.

translated: Do not attend to mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed /

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed /üîΩnang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la mi byed / nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThey do not pay attention to inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to outer emptiness.üîΩThey do not pay attention to inner and outer emptiness.

original: @7b stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩchen po stong pa nyid yid la mi byed //
analyzed: @7b stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / chen po stong pa nyid yid la mi byed //
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness that is a non-entity.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the ultimate emptiness.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of beginning and end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of defining characteristics.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la mi byed / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of non-things.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi byed /üîΩdbang po lnga yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la mi byed / dbang po lnga yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four legs of magical emanation.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the five faculties.

original: stobs lnga yid la mi byed /
analyzed: stobs lnga yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the five powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi byed /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the seven branches of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi byed /üîΩ'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la mi byed / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the noble eightfold path.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the four noble truths.

original: bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la mi byed /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la mi byed /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: @8a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yid la mi byed /
analyzed: @8a *// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are doors to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams yid la mi byed /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the clairvoyances.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la mi byed /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the meditative stabilities.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi byed /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la mi byed /üîΩbyams pa chen po yid la mi byed /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la mi byed / byams pa chen po yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to the four detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩThey do not pay attention to great love.

original: snying rje chen po yid la mi byed /
analyzed: snying rje chen po yid la mi byed /
translated: They do not pay attention to great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la mi byed; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la mi byed; rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to the result of stream enterer.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to the result of once-returner.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to the result of non-returner.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yid la mi byed /üîΩrang byang chub yid la mi byed /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yid la mi byed / rang byang chub yid la mi byed /
translated: They should not pay attention to the state of a worthy one.üîΩThey should not pay attention to a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening.üîΩThey should not pay attention to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la mi byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid la mi byed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur te /
translated: When that is the case, the wholesome roots of bodhisattva great beings increase.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because the wholesome roots increase, the six perfections are completed.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas /
translated: Because the six perfections are completed,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro /
translated: they attain the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: gzugs yid la ma byas /
analyzed: gzugs yid la ma byas /
translated: it is because they do not pay attention to form,

original: tshor pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: tshor pa yid la ma byas /
translated: do not pay attention to feeling,

original: 'du shes yid la ma byas /
analyzed: 'du shes yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to perceptions.

original: @8b 'du byed yid la ma byas /
analyzed: @8b 'du byed yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to formative predispositions.

original: rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to consciousness.

original: mig yid la ma byas /üîΩrna ba yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mig yid la ma byas / rna ba yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the eyes.üîΩDo not attend to the ears.

original: sna yid la ma byas /
analyzed: sna yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the nose.

original: lce yid la ma byas /üîΩlus yid la ma byas; yid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lce yid la ma byas / lus yid la ma byas; yid yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the tongue.

original: gzugs yid la ma byas /
analyzed: gzugs yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the body. Do not attend to the mental faculty.üîΩDo not attend to sights.

original: sgra yid la ma byas /üîΩdri yid la ma byas /
analyzed: sgra yid la ma byas / dri yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to sounds.üîΩDo not attend to smells.

original: ro yid la ma byas /üîΩreg yid la ma byas /
analyzed: ro yid la ma byas / reg yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to tastes.üîΩDo not attend to physical objects.

original: chos yid la ma byas /
analyzed: chos yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /üîΩsna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas / sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the ear consciousness.üîΩDo not attend to the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the tongue consciousness.

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to the mental consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to eye contact.üîΩDo not attend to ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: Do not attend to nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to mind contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /üîΩrna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas /üîΩ@9a *// sa'i khams yid la ma byas /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma byas / @9a *// sa'i khams yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the earth element.

original: chu'i khams yid la ma byas /
analyzed: chu'i khams yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the water element.

original: me'i khams yid la ma byas /üîΩrlung gi khams yid la ma byas /
analyzed: me'i khams yid la ma byas / rlung gi khams yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the fire element.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams yid la ma byas /üîΩrnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma byas /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams yid la ma byas / rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the space element.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: ma rig pa yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to ignorance.

original: 'du byed yid la ma byas /
analyzed: 'du byed yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs yid la ma byas /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to name and form.

original: skye mched drug yid la ma byas /
analyzed: skye mched drug yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the six sense fields.

original: reg pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: reg pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to contact.

original: tshor ba yid la ma byas /üîΩsred pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: tshor ba yid la ma byas / sred pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to feeling.üîΩThey do not pay attention to craving.

original: len pa yid la ma byas /üîΩsrid pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: len pa yid la ma byas / srid pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to appropriation.üîΩThey do not pay attention to existence.

original: skye pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: skye pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to birth.

original: rga shi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rga shi yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of giving.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of morality.üîΩThey do not pay attention to the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas /üîΩnang stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩphyi stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma byas / nang stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThey do not pay attention to inner emptiness.üîΩThey do not pay attention to outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: They do not pay attention to inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of great extent.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩmtha' las 'das @9b pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / mtha' las 'das @9b pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma byas / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of nonobservation.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the emptiness of the absence of intrinsic nature.üîΩHe did not pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the emptiness of the essential nature of nonthings.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
translated: He did not pay attention to the four establishments of mindfulness,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la ma byas /üîΩdbang po lnga yid la ma byas /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yid la ma byas / dbang po lnga yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the four legs of magical power,üîΩhe did not pay attention to the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga yid la ma byas /
analyzed: stobs lnga yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma byas /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the seven parts of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma byas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yid la ma byas /
translated: he did not pay attention to the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi yid la ma byas /

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma byas /
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma byas /

original: snying rje chen po yid la ma byas /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la ma byas /

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la ma byas / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma byas /

analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma byas /

original: dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma byas /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma byas /

original: rang byang chub yid la ma byas pas /
analyzed: rang byang chub yid la ma byas pas /
translated: He does not pay attention to a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening.

analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o //
translated: He fully awakens to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, ‚ÄúLord,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

analyzed: de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis / de ltar tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: de ltar 'du shes yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar 'du byed yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar 'du byed yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to formation.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar mig yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar mig yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to consciousness.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to the eyes.

original: de ltar rna ba yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar sna yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rna ba yid la ma bgyis / de ltar sna yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the ears.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to the nose.

original: de ltar lce yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lce yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the tongue.

original: de ltar lus yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lus yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the body.

original: de ltar yid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar yid yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to form.

original: de ltar sgra yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar dri yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sgra yid la ma bgyis / de ltar dri yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to sound.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to smell.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to taste.

analyzed: de ltar ro yid la ma @10b bgyis; de ltar reg yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to texture.

original: de ltar chos yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /

translated: In the same way, do not attend to mental phenomena.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to the eye consciousness.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to the ear consciousness.

original: de ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sna'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the nose consciousness.

original: de ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lce'i rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the tongue consciousness.

original: de ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the body consciousness.

original: de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: de ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to tongue contact.

original: de ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to body contact.

original: de ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: de ltar mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar sa'i khams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sa'i khams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to the earth element.

original: de ltar chu'i khams yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar me'i khams yid la @11a *//
analyzed: de ltar chu'i khams yid la ma bgyis / de ltar me'i khams yid la @11a *//
translated: In this way, do not attend to the water element.üîΩIn this way, do not attend to the fire element.

original: ma bgyis / de ltar rlung gi khams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: ma bgyis / de ltar rlung gi khams yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar nam mkha' khams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha' khams yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa'i khams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to the consciousness element.

original: de ltar ma rig pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar ma rig pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to ignorance.

original: de ltar 'du byed yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar 'du byed yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to volitional factors.

original: de ltar rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par shes pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to consciousness.

original: de ltar ming dang gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar ming dang gzugs yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to name and form.

original: de ltar skye mched drug yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar skye mched drug yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to the six sense sources.

original: de ltar reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar reg pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In this way, do not attend to contact.

original: de ltar tshor ba yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar sred pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar tshor ba yid la ma bgyis / de ltar sred pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to feelings.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to craving.

original: de ltar len pa yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar srid pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar len pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar srid pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to grasping.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to becoming.

original: de ltar skye ba yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar skye ba yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to birth.

original: de ltar rga shi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rga shi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to old age and death.

original: de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the perfection of generosity.

original: de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the perfection of moral discipline.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to the perfection of patience.

original: de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the perfection of perseverance.

original: de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the perfection of concentration.

original: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la ma bgyis / de ltar nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis / de ltar phyi stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to inner emptiness.üîΩIn the same way, do not attend to outer emptiness.

original: de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not attend to inner and outer emptiness.

original: de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de ltar @11b chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar @11b chen po stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the great emptiness.

original: de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis / de ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩIn the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis / de ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of no beginning and no end.

original: de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of no abandonment.

original: de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rang bzhin stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis / de ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of its own mark.üîΩIn the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: de ltar dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, do not pay attention to the emptiness of non-things.

original: de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the emptiness of essential nature.

original: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four establishments of mindfulness.

original: de ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four right efforts.

original: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar dbang po lnga yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi yid la ma bgyis / de ltar dbang po lnga yid la ma bgyis /

original: de ltar stobs lnga yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar stobs lnga yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the five powers.

original: de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the seven parts of awakening.

original: de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the noble eightfold path.

original: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four noble truths.

original: de ltar bsam gtan bzhi @12a *//üîΩyid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar tshad med pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar bsam gtan bzhi @12a *// yid la ma bgyis / de ltar tshad med pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four concentrations.üîΩIn the same way, they do not pay attention to the four immeasurables.

original: de ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four formless absorptions.

original: de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the eight liberations.

original: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yid la ma bgyis /

analyzed: de ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yid la ma bgyis /
