original: de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar mngon par shes pa rnams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the clairvoyances.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin rnams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the meditative stabilizations.

original: de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the ten tathƒÅgata powers.

original: de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four fearlessnesses.

original: de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar byams pa chen po yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yid la ma bgyis / de ltar byams pa chen po yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the four detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩIn the same way, they do not pay attention to great love.

original: de ltar snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar snying rje chen po yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to great compassion.

original: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis / de ltar lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis /
translated: In the same way, they do not pay attention to the result of stream enterer,üîΩthey do not pay attention to the result of once-returner,

original: de ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis /üîΩde ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yid la ma bgyis / de ltar dgra bcom pa nyid yid la ma bgyis /
translated: they do not pay attention to the result of non-returner,üîΩthey do not pay attention to the state of a worthy one,

original: de ltar rang byang chub yid la ma bgyis /
analyzed: de ltar rang byang chub yid la ma bgyis /
translated: they do not pay attention to a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening,

original: de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @12b pa'i byang chub yid la ma bgyis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur /üîΩbcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs @12b pa'i byang chub yid la ma bgyis par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: and they do not pay attention to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and they attain the knowledge of all aspects.‚ÄùüîΩThe Lord said,

original: yid la byed pas ni /
analyzed: yid la byed pas ni /
translated: ‚ÄúSubh≈´ti, it is because they pay attention that

original: gal te 'dod pa'i khams sam /
analyzed: gal te 'dod pa'i khams sam /
translated: they would mix up the desire realm,

original: gal te gzugs kyi khams sam /
analyzed: gal te gzugs kyi khams sam /
translated: they would mix up the form realm,

original: gal te gzugs med pa'i khams su 'dre par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te gzugs med pa'i khams su 'dre par 'gyur te /
translated: and they would mix up the formless realm.

original: yid la mi byed pas ni gang du'ang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid la mi byed pas ni gang du'ang 'dre bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But because they do not pay attention they do not mix up anything at all.‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúLord, how do bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom not pay attention?‚Äù

original: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang dang gang 'dre bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang dang gang 'dre bar mi bya'o //
translated: Subhuti: What dharmas does he not mix up?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: The Lord: He does not mix up the five grasping skandhas.üîΩSubhuti: Where does the Bodhisattva who courses in perfect wisdom stand?üîΩThe Lord: He does not stand in form, etc.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why he does not stand in form, etc.?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc. is not something that can be apprehended.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang la gnas par 'gyur /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa de gang la gnas par 'gyur /
translated: Subhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is not something that can be apprehended?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc. is empty of form, etc.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is empty of form, etc.?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is isolated from form, etc.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Subhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is isolated from form, etc.?

original: gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is unproduced.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is unproduced?

original: tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩ'du shes la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // 'du shes la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is unarisen.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is unarisen?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc. is unceased.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is unceased?

original: 'du byed la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is originally in a state of quiescence.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is originally in a state of quiescence?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc. is essentially in a state of quiescence.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is essentially in a state of quiescence?

original: rnam par shes pa la gnas bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la gnas bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is empty of essential nature.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is empty of essential nature?

original: mig la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrna ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // rna ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is isolated from essential nature.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is isolated from essential nature?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc. is unproduced.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is unproduced?

original: sna la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sna la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The Lord: Because form, etc. is unarisen.üîΩSubhuti: What is the reason why form, etc. is unarisen?üîΩThe Lord: Because form, etc.

original: lce la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lce la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on the tongue,

original: lus la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on the body,

original: yid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on the mind,

original: gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsgra la gnas @13a *//
analyzed: gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // sgra la gnas @13a *//
translated: it does not rest on form,

original: par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdri la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: par mi 'gyur ro // dri la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on sound,üîΩit does not rest on smell,

original: ro la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ro la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on taste,

original: reg la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: reg la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on touch,üîΩit does not rest on dharmas,

original: chos la gnas par mi 'gyur ro; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos la gnas par mi 'gyur ro; ;mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on eye consciousness,

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // sna'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on ear consciousness,üîΩit does not rest on nose consciousness,

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on tongue consciousness,

original: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it does not rest on body consciousness,

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and it does not rest on mind consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not rest on eye contact,

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro /
translated: it does not rest on ear contact,

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the union of nose and smells.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the union of tongue and tastes.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the union of body and touchables.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the union of thinking mind and dharmas.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of eye, form, and consciousness.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of ear, sound, and consciousness.üîΩHe does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of nose, smells, and consciousness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of tongue, tastes, and consciousness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of body, touchables, and consciousness.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @13b tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis @13b tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // sa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the feeling that arises from the condition of the union of thinking-mind, dharmas, and consciousness.üîΩHe does not stand in the earth element.

original: chu'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chu'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: He does not stand in the water element.

original: me'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrlung gi khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // rlung gi khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in the fire element,üîΩthey do not stand in the wind element,

original: nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in the space element,

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma rig pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not stand in ignorance,

original: 'du byed la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in volitional action,

original: rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in consciousness,

original: ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in name and form,

original: skye mched drug la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skye mched drug la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in the six sense spheres,

original: reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: reg pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in contact,

original: tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshor ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in feeling,

original: sred pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sred pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in craving,

original: len pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: len pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in appropriation,üîΩthey do not stand in existence,

original: srid pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro; ;skye ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro; ;skye ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they do not stand in birth,

original: rga shi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rga shi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they do not stand in old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They do not stand in the perfection of giving,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩbzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the perfection of morality,üîΩthey will not stand in the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will not stand in the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in inner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩphyi nang @14a *//
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // phyi nang @14a *//
translated: they will not stand in outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in great emptiness,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in ultimate emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in conditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the uncompounded.üîΩThey will not stand in the emptiness that is the non-repudiation of either conditioned or unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of non-dispersal.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of individual characteristics.üîΩThey will not stand in the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of non-things.üîΩThey will not stand in the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the essential nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the four applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four right efforts,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdbang po lnga la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // dbang po lnga la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four legs of supernormal power,üîΩthey will not stand in the five faculties,

original: stobs lnga la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: stobs lnga la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the five powers,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the seven parts of awakening,

original: @14b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @14b 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the noble eightfold path,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four noble truths,

original: bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four concentrations,

original: tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four immeasurables,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the four formless absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the eight deliverances,

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the nine serial absorptions,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩmngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the sphere of the eye, the emptiness of the sphere of the ear, the emptiness of the sphere of the nose, the emptiness of the sphere of the tongue, the emptiness of the sphere of the body, or the emptiness of the sphere of the mental faculty.

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the sphere of form, the emptiness of the sphere of sound, the emptiness of the sphere of smell, the emptiness of the sphere of taste, the emptiness of the sphere of tangibles, or the emptiness of the sphere of dharmas.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩso so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the eye constituent, the emptiness of the form constituent, the emptiness of the eye consciousness constituent, the emptiness of the ear constituent, the emptiness of the sound constituent, the emptiness of the ear consciousness constituent, the emptiness of the nose constituent, the emptiness of the smell constituent, the emptiness of the nose consciousness constituent, the emptiness of the tongue constituent, the emptiness of the taste constituent, the emptiness of the tongue consciousness constituent, the emptiness of the body constituent, the emptiness of the tangible constituent, the emptiness of the body consciousness constituent, the emptiness of the mental constituent, the emptiness of the dharma constituent, or the emptiness of the mind consciousness constituent.

original: byams pa chen po la gnas phyir mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsnying rje chen po la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩsangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byams pa chen po la gnas phyir mi 'gyur ro // snying rje chen po la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the perfection of giving, the emptiness of the perfection of morality, the emptiness of the perfection of patience, the emptiness of the perfection of perseverance, the emptiness of the perfection of concentration, or the emptiness of the perfection of wisdom.üîΩThey will not stand in the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness, the emptiness of the right efforts, the emptiness of the legs of miraculous power, the emptiness of the faculties, the emptiness of the powers, the emptiness of the branches of enlightenment, or the emptiness of the path.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not stand in the emptiness of the fruit of a stream enterer, the emptiness of the fruit of a once-returner, the emptiness of the fruit of a non-returner, the emptiness of the fruit of an arhat, the emptiness of a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening, or the emptiness of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //üîΩdgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par @15a *//
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi 'gyur ro // dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par @15a *//
translated: they will not stand in the fruit of non-returner,

original: mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang byang chub la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in a pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: they will not stand in the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: and they will not stand in the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, Bhagavan,

original: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur ba lags /
translated: ‚ÄúLord, why will they not stand in the knowledge of all aspects?üîΩ‚Äù

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir gang la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir gang la'ang gnas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúBecause they are not attached to anything will they not stand anywhere.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar des gang la mngon par chags par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar des gang la mngon par chags par bya ba'am /
translated: And why is that?üîΩBecause they do not see any dharma at all to which they could be attached

original: gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: or in which they could stand.

original: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ltar na /
translated: Subh≈´ti, it is because of that

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par chags pa med pa dang gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par chags pa med pa dang gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: Bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom without attachment and without abiding.

original: gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing /
analyzed: gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings think,

original: gang de ltar spyod pa dang / de ltar bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
analyzed: gang de ltar spyod pa dang / de ltar bsgom pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa /
translated: ‚ÄòThose who practice and cultivate like that practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ste /
translated: cultivate the perfection of wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do //
translated: I practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom mo snyam ste /
analyzed: bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom mo snyam ste /
translated: I cultivate the perfection of wisdom,‚Äô

original: gal te de ltar 'du shes na /üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te de ltar 'du shes na / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du byed pa yin no //
translated: if they conceptualize like that,üîΩthey are far from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @15b las ring du gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @15b las ring du gyur pa de ni /
translated: Those who are far from the perfection of wisdom

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the perfection of meditative stability.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the perfection of diligence.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the perfection of patience.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the perfection of discipline.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩnang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du gyur pa yin / nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the perfection of generosity.üîΩThey are far from inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩphyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from outer emptiness.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of both outer and inner.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩchen po stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / chen po stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩThey are far from great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / 'dus byas stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩthog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of other.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness that is the nonexistence of anything at all.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness that is the nature of nonexistence.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of emptiness.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of ultimate reality.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of the unlimited.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩrang bzhin stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / rang bzhin stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of non-discarded phenomena.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩThey are far from the emptiness of essential nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩdran pa nye @16a *//üîΩbar gzhag pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin / dran pa nye @16a *// bar gzhag pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.üîΩThey are far from the four kinds of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far from the four right efforts.

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩdbang po lnga las ring du gyur ba yin /
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin / dbang po lnga las ring du gyur ba yin /
translated: They are far removed from the four supports for miraculous abilities.üîΩThey are far removed from the five powers.

original: stobs lnga las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: stobs lnga las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the five strengths.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the seven aspects of enlightenment.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the four truths of the noble ones.

original: bsam gtan bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the four concentrations.

original: tshad med pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the four immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the four formless absorptions.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the eight aspects of liberation.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the nine serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: They are far removed from the emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness that are gateways to liberation.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the superknowledges,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the meditative stabilizations,

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo rnams las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateways,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las ring du gyur pa yin; mi 'jigs pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu las ring du gyur pa yin; mi 'jigs pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the ten powers of the tathƒÅgatas, they are far from the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin /üîΩbyams pa chen po las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi las ring du gyur pa yin / byams pa chen po las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the four detailed and thorough knowledges,üîΩthey are far from great love,

original: snying rje chen @16b po las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: snying rje chen @16b po las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from great compassion,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the result of once-returner,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the result of non-returner,

original: dgra bcom pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the state of a worthy one,

original: rang byang chub las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rang byang chub las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the pratyekabuddha‚Äôs awakening,

original: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: they are far from the knowledge of path aspects,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las ring du gyur pa yin /
translated: and they are far from the knowledge of all aspects.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: Because the perfection of wisdom

original: gang la'ang mngon par chags par mi byed de /
analyzed: gang la'ang mngon par chags par mi byed de /
translated: does not settle down on anything at all,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa gang yang med do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa gang yang med do //
translated: and there is no settling down on the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de ni / 'di ltar gang la mngon par chags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin de la med de /
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar gang la mngon par chags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rang bzhin de la med de /
translated: Because that nature does not exist in the way it is settled down on.

original: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams par 'gyur te /
translated: Subh≈´ti, if bodhisattva great beings have the notion of the perfection of wisdom, those bodhisattva great beings have fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa de ni /
analyzed: gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa de ni /
translated: Whoever falls away from the perfection of wisdom,

original: chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad las nyams par 'gyur ro //
translated: falls away from all dharmas.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: If he thinks, ‚ÄòThe perfection of wisdom embraces the five perfections,‚Äô

original: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems @17a *//
analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems @17a *//
translated: then that Bodhisattva,

original: dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: that great being, falls away from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /üîΩnang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni / nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: If he thinks, ‚ÄòThe perfection of wisdom embracesüîΩinner emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to /
translated: outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: inner and outer emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //üîΩdon dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to // don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: great emptiness,üîΩabsolute emptiness,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: emptiness of conditioned phenomena,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of the unconditioned.üîΩHe embraces the emptiness of the transcendence of extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of the absence of beginning and end.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of nonrepudiation.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of inherent existence.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of all things.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //üîΩdngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of nonapprehension.üîΩHe embraces the emptiness of the absence of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He embraces the emptiness of the intrinsic nature of nonexistence.

original: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: If he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

translated: If he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: If he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.üîΩIf he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen away from the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: gal te yang de'ang snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /

analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: then the bodhisattva great being has fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
analyzed: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
translated: If he thinks, ‚ÄòThe perfection of wisdom

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: holds on to the knowledge of all aspects,‚Äô

original: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te /üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas ni /
analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bas ni /
translated: But if he thinks, ‚ÄòThose who have been prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening have stood in the perfection of wisdom,‚Äô then that bodhisattva great being has declined from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so //üîΩgal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa ni /üîΩbla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so // gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas pa ni / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to //
translated: Because they are separated from the perfection of wisdom, they are not able to fully awaken to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te /üîΩshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa ni /
analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa yin te / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pa ni /
translated: If he thinks, ‚ÄòThose who have been prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening have stood in the perfection of wisdom,‚Äô then that bodhisattva great being has declined from the perfection of wisdom.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston to //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi ston to //
translated: Because they have declined from the perfection of wisdom, they are not prophesied to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: gal te yang de 'di snyam du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas te byang chub sems dpa' @20b sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: accomplish the perfection of morality,üîΩaccomplish the perfection of patience,

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩnang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub bo // nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: phyi stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: accomplish outer emptiness,

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: accomplish the emptiness of emptiness,

original: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: One should accomplish the emptiness of the ultimate.üîΩOne should accomplish the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon bar bsgrub bo //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon bar bsgrub bo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: One should accomplish the emptiness of the unconditioned.üîΩOne should accomplish the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩdor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: One should accomplish the emptiness of what is without beginning or end.üîΩOne should accomplish the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩmi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: One should accomplish the emptiness of specific characteristics.üîΩOne should accomplish the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: One should accomplish the emptiness of non-entities.üîΩOne should accomplish the emptiness of essential nature.

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: yang @21a *// dag par spong ba bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: They accomplish the four legs of miraculous power.

original: dbang po lnga mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: dbang po lnga mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: stobs lnga mngon par bsgrub bo; ;byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par bsgrub bo //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He should accomplish the ten tathƒÅgata powers.

analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo //üîΩbyams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub bo // byams pa chen po mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He should accomplish the four detailed and thorough knowledges.üîΩHe should accomplish great love.

original: snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He should accomplish great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par bsgrub bo //
translated: He should accomplish the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu @21b phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: snyam na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu @21b phyin pa las nyams pa yin no //
translated: But if he thinks like that, then that bodhisattva great being has fallen from the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pas ni /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyams pas ni /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: one is not able to accomplish the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the perfection of moral discipline.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the perfection of perseverance.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the perfection of wisdom.

original: nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so; ;phyi stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so; ;phyi stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish inner emptiness. One is not able to accomplish outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: One is not able to accomplish the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of the great cannot be accomplished,

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //üîΩ'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of the ultimate cannot be accomplished,üîΩthe emptiness of the conditioned cannot be accomplished,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //üîΩmtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of the unconditioned cannot be accomplished,üîΩthe emptiness of what is beyond extremes cannot be accomplished,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of the beginningless and endless cannot be accomplished,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of nonrepudiation cannot be accomplished,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of inherent existence cannot be accomplished,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the emptiness of all phenomena cannot be accomplished,

original: @22a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: @22a *// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: and the emptiness of nonobservation cannot be accomplished.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //üîΩngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: The four establishments of mindfulness cannot be accomplished,

original: yang dag par spong ba bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the four right efforts cannot be accomplished,

original: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //üîΩdbang po lnga mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so // dbang po lnga mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the four legs of magical power cannot be accomplished,üîΩthe five faculties cannot be accomplished,

original: stobs lnga mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: stobs lnga mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the five powers cannot be accomplished,

original: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: the seven factors of awakening cannot be accomplished,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: and the noble eightfold path cannot be accomplished.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: The four noble truths cannot be accomplished,

original: bsam gtan bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot accomplish the four meditative states;

original: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: tshad med pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot accomplish the four immeasurables;

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot accomplish the four formless concentrations;

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so; ;mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
translated: they cannot accomplish the eight deliverances; they cannot accomplish the nine serial absorptions;

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i @22b mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i @22b mngon par bsgrub par mi nus so //
